ommc.gui.title.configs: Oh My Minecraft Client - Config - Version: %s
ommc.config.generic.openConfigGui.name: openConfigGui
ommc.config.generic.openConfigGui.commen: A hotkey to open the in-game Config GUI
ommc.config.generic.debug.name: debug
ommc.config.generic.dontClearChatHistory: Don't clear chat history and input history.
ommc.config.generic.clearWaypoint.name: clearWaypoint
ommc.config.generic.clearWaypoint.commen: A hotkey to clear highlight waypoint.
ommc.config.generic.forceParseWaypointFr: Force parse waypoint from chat (such it will override the clickevent of rtext).
ommc.config.generic.sendLookingAtBlockPo: A hotkey to send looking at pos.
ommc.config.generic.sortInventory.name: sortInventory
ommc.config.generic.sortInventorySupport: Support empty shulker box stack when sort inventory.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.betterSneakin: Player can move down 1 height when sneaking.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disableBlockl: Workaround for MC-218167, prevent network request from blocking the Render Thread.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disableBreakS: You can only break scaffolding with the items in §6breakScaffoldingWhiteList§r.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disableMoveDo: You can only move down scaffolding with the items inside §6moveDownInScaffoldingWhiteList§r in your hand.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.disablePiston: Prevent piston push entities (except the player) to reduce piston lag (such as the carpet duper), it will cause entities pos error when entity push by piston.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.flatDigger.co: Which allowed you mine a flat road while digging stone by preventing digging of blocks under your feet while standing，sneak to dig blocks under you.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.forceBreaking: You will have 5gt cooldown after instant breaking.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.highlightPers: Highlight persistent mobs (Mob have item in hand or mob have custom name).

Use client data to check persistent mob, such as hand item, custom name. Tips: in local game should disable this option, in server also can use syncAllEntityData in MasaGadget to sync entity data to local.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.preventIntent: Prevent Intentional Game Design (Bed and Respawn Anchor).
ommc.config.feature_toggle.preventWastag: Prevent water bucket from vanishing in nether.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.worldEaterMin: When the blocks in §6worldEaterMineHelperWhitelist§r are exposed to the air, the game will render a mirror image above them, which is convenient for world eater maintenance and mining.
You cannot ascend or descend non-full blocks when sneaking, e.g. carpets.
ommc.config.feature_toggle.removeBreakin: Remove cooldown after break block (default is 5gt), it will not work when enable §6forceBreakingCooldown§r.
ommc.config.lists.breakBlockBlackList.co: If §6disableBreakScaffolding§r is enabled, you can't break blocks in §6breakBlockBlackList§r.
ommc.config.lists.breakScaffoldingWhiteL: If §6disableBreakScaffolding§r is enabled, you can only break scaffolding with the items in §6breakScaffoldingWhiteList§r.
ommc.config.lists.moveDownInScaffoldingW: If §6disableMoveDownInScaffolding§r is enabled, you can only move down scaffolding with the items inside §6moveDownInScaffoldingWhiteList§r in your hand.
ommc.config.lists.worldEaterMineHelperWh: If §6worldEaterMineHelper§r is enabled, when the blocks in §6worldEaterMineHelperWhitelist§r are exposed to the air, the game will render a mirror image above them, which is convenient for world eater maintenance and mining.
ommc.config.advanced_integrated_server.p: Integrated server lan port, 0 to use default port.
ommc.highlight_waypoint.tooltip: Click to highlight waypoint. Click again to display the beam.
